Name: HIVE
About the game: Welcome to HIVE! Survive waves of evil Hive-members, giant bosses, all while unraveling the mystery of how your world was taken over only four months ago. You'll need to fight off the horde, maintain your Fortitude - or face the consequences. Search for clues, or go in guns blazing and save your planet. Game Features: BUILD YOUR SKILLS: Spend Fortitude to strategically earn skills, slowing time or instantaneously hacking every radio tower in the area. UPGRADE WEAPONS: Bazookas, mini-guns, and your trusty pistol, no matter your choice of protection, spend Fortitude to increase your shot damage, range, and more! POWER BEYOND BELIEF: Harness the power of your Fortitude and cast magical spells, slowing your enemies - or blowing them to bits. HUGE MAPS: Loot the city, the boonies, and more! Find hidden Fortitude and ammo wherever you go!
Meta Title: HIVE: Jul 30, 2020, Sue Bean Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on HIVE? Check out the release date (Jul 30, 2020), developer insights from Sue Bean Studios, and a complete game summary.
